description: Creates the specified secret for use with external data sources in the specified database. This is deprecated and will be removed in the next release. Please use CreateCredential instead.

database_name.description: The name of the database in which to create the secret.

parameters.description: The parameters required to create the secret (name and password)

password.description: the password for the secret to pass in

uri.description: the URI identifier for the secret in the format :
